author: jstrachan
msg: Added a small experimental module which creates DynaBeans from a database model and can insert/update/delete data from a relational database using the familiar DyanBeans paradigm.
Similar in essence to a very simplified version of Simper http://netmeme.org/simper/ that is Servlets and Struts independent.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o Quick fix to get the compilation working.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o Don't need the SQLExec task as we will control the logic and ordering of
SQL insertion with Jelly script and just reuse the Ant task.
o Don't need the TypeMap as we are not going to be using velocity

author: jstrachan
msg: First cut at a simple SQLBuilderFactory that allows a simple JAXP-style way to load an SqlBuilder implementation from a database type String.
Also added the first cut of a DDLTask, an Ant Task that will take an XML description of a database and generate the DDL to create the database for a given physical database.
